Input: The ability to downvote or thumbs down content I do not agree with
I want to express my disagreement in a simple way
I would like the ability to view a list of posts I liked
I would like to look at content I thought was good/positive, this would make that easy
The ability to only have posts placed by my friends show up on my facebook homepage, and not liked pages or reactions/comments
Because it makes it makes it harder to view the actually interesting content, the posts by my friends
I would like to be able to edit photos  that I upload, with for example text and filters, as I upload them
Because it would be easier to not have to first edit the photo in another program before uploading it
I would like the ability to write a single post in several languages, so that my friends can read the version written for their language
Because I have friends from all over, and some don't speak english well, and I want them to be able to understand my posts
